text: DON'T MISS Beyonc√© is pregnant with TWINS! Jay-Z's wife reveals surprise baby news while putting her big bump on show Broke the happy news on Wednesday That's a butt rude! Mel Gibson and Vince Vaughn team up for police brutality film Dragged Across Concrete What a duo Making a splash! Rowling tweets sassy retorts to Harry Potter fans who threatened to burn her books The bad and the funny! Kendall Jenner shares sultry lingerie-clad snap as she declares 'boys lie' Showed off her slender physique My big fat fabulous pregnancy! Gigi Hadid is chic in skintight leather jeans and sporty jacket as she steps out in NYC Hard to miss The family is back': Nicki Minaj and Drake reunite after TWO years to call a truce following her split with Meek Mill The bitter feud ids clearly over Back to normal!
